summary.para: The CERT_LOGOTYPE_INFO structure contains information about logotype data.
Specifies the type of logotype data. This can be one of the following values.

description.para: The logotype data is available directly. The pLogotypeDirectInfo member contains the actual logotype data.
The logotype data is available through a reference. The pLogotypeIndirectInfo member contains a reference to the logotype information.

summary.para: The address of a structure that contains the actual logotype data. This member is only used if the dwLogotypeInfoChoice member contains CERT_LOGOTYPE_DIRECT_INFO_CHOICE.
The address of a structure that contains references to the logotype data. This member is only used if the dwLogotypeInfoChoice member contains CERT_LOGOTYPE_INDIRECT_INFO_CHOICE.
